Description:
JO CRYSTAL
Pools: 7
Loose: 250
A healing crystal awaits being pushed out of the northern route. Destroying it unleashes its energy and takes another minute to regenerate.

The crystal I wear around my neck contains an essence that gets recharged when I jack it with a thug who also has a crystal. It gives me confidence at mid, home, social situations, etc. Nobody knows it's a JO crystal but me and my thugs. I have seen it glow white while jerking it with a thug thats how I know this is real. You can come over for as long as you want but I need a picture of you preferably wearing a crystal before I waste my time.

Created for VSR by blue_banana

This arsehole demystifies consciousness? Consciousness is what the 5 senses present through the brain for the decisions of the user, the spirit (energy). There's only the intangible spirit (energy) and the tangible body (including brain), you bearded arsehole, Dumb Dennett! E = MC2 ENERGY = MassXthe speed of light squared (186,000X186,000 square miles per second) Energy = MassX 34,596,000,000 square miles per second Jesus (is alleged to have) said, "God is a Spirit (ENERGY- the Ultimate Intangible) God is everywhere Yahweh of the Jews was/is an alien. The same who tempted Jesus with worldly possessions. Jesus was the son of a compassionate alien, superior to Yahweh, thus Jesus reminding Yahweh "Thou shall not tempt the Lord, thy God." Mary, Jesus' mother, was impregnated with the seed of the alien, unknown to her, something done today by man with artificial insemination. "The son can do nothing of himself" (John 5: 19). This alien was not God, who is everywhere, but in sync with the powers of God. Paul Hellyer, a former Canadian minister of the Federal government, said that the 'star' the Magi followed was probably the exhaust of a UFO. Jesus, a human/alien offspring, is reported to have said, "My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me." There is NO death! Mission accomplished! 'Nuff said!?

Name: Cracked
Author: Gravey
Description:
You got that shit? You got that shit bro? I got three bucks. Oh gime dat, Oh Oh I gotta go back for my three bucks. Ohuh you won't believe what happened to me, then there was this dude, then there was this chick, and then there was this pipe, and then it broke, and then we ran, and then we went to CVS, and then there was security everywhere, and then I hit this guy. And he hit me and then called the cops, and they came and they let me go. You got that shit?....Common man you got that shit? I need that shit. Your settin me up here! Your settin me up here! Is this the wrong house? Is this the wrong house? Is this the wrong house? They got the crack here right? Oh fuck you guys don't have crack, well fuck you guys. When I come back you better have some crack.

Don't do drugs kids

240 Loose

Name: Dream
Author: Vearidons
Description:
ST: VSR: TVD: Dream
Environment: Bane
Pools: 7
Loose: 185

BOOM... Last night I had a dream about Battlezone 2.
I was just a pilot in a msl scout, when I see this bomber.
It wasn't the ordinary bz2 bomber. It was the bz2 bomber, with a container holding six bombs.
I saw them blow up the Scion base. A few seconds later I see another one. But this time it went to a biometal pool and dropped the bombs.
The bombs didn't hit the pool (there wasn't even a scavenger (dumb bomber) ) It came back and dropped more bombs at the extractorless pool.
A bomb hit the pool and it turned into an upgraded upgraded extractor. It was pumping 20 in 5 seconds.
Then somehow that bomber blew me up and that's when I woke up. I'll get a drawing later.

Map created by the Vearidons.

Author: Vearidons
Description:
ST: VSR: TVD: Forgotten
Pools: 7
Loose: 170

I understand that Archers, Furies, Scion Gunships, and possibly Bombers can all be piloted. However, I wish to know if APCs and other flying units can be piloted by humans in certain mods or patches...

P.S. It must be f**king wonderful to pilot an APC. Just imagine, being in control of dropping off soldiers and returning them to safety, and possibly even rescuing your own commander or fellow pilots from enemy territory... (without them relying on jetpacks or unit pick-ups)

Name: Hubris
Author: Gravey
Description:
In the game I had 2 gts, 1 assault tank, missle scout, spare sabre, and a truck but he got it because my own ai killed me and he could dump his ammo on the rec. Were arguing about the wrong shit. Its not about how to stop it, its that it shouldnt be POSSIBLE at all. There should not be enough scavs possible due to unit limit to do it because its stupid as fuck and has continued to be a problem, people trying to do it to me over and over in 1v1s and strats, they either lose because of it or they, through virtue of having better teams, sit and camp my team with lase while waiting for the scavs. In both cases it degrades our strats and makes them a waste of time. Also consider the fact that a player of his "cailbre" can beat me with it, what a joke of a mechanic.

6 pools
Medium Size
430 loose, spread out.
No base pool.

Map by Gravey

Name: Impact
Author: Gravey
Description:
Man, we just wanted some food after getting smashed at the bars. We stopped at Taco Bell and I ordered a chalupa. My friend could not keep his shirt on. Guess he is one of those drunks. Meanwhile, some drunk high school kids came in after us. This lanky kid comes up right after I unwrap my chalupa, takes it off my tray, and starts eating it. About halfway through, he sets it down and starts trying to have a conversation. That is when he looked at me, in his drunken stupor, and asked, "are you going to finish that?" while pointing at my chalupa he just ate. I looked him dead in the eyes and said, "Yes."

7 pools

Large Map
1200m Base to Base
Loose North,Mid,South
Double Pool North and South. Single Mid. Single behind base.
No Base Pool, use that base loose early or fall behind.

Map by Gravey

Name: Know Thyself
Author: Vearidons
Description:
ST: VSR: TVD: Know Thyself
Environment: Ground Zero
Pools: 7
Loose: 200

If you people wish for BZ2 to stay alive, then you should have to take pride in having a community.
'Some' of you may want to change your attitude, and not act like an absolute retard, in order to retain this community.
Else, people will be leaving.
Some have already left, and many more will continue to leave if this goes on.
Is that what you want?

After my gaming experience this night, i seriously consider to do leave.
There was no way to reason. there was no way to connect.
There was nothing but the feeling of being surrounded by absolute goons
with which i did not want to play with.

Map created by the Vearidons.

Name: Oasis
Author: Gravey
Description:
You're out at the dunes having the time of your life, driving up and down hills, enjoying the cool night air and sand in your crotch, and then you see something in the distance. It's a man, buck naked wearing a diaper with a ball gag in his mouth, running in your direction. Further in the distance you see some dust kicking up. It looks like a bunch of degenerates. Will you send this man back to his cruel fate or take him with you?

Name: Vegan
Author: Vearidons
Description:
ST: VSR: TVD: Vegan
Pools: 7
Loose: 190

I am a vegan and an atheist. I am passionate about animal rights, human rights and being rational.
You don't have to be an atheist to be vegan, and you don't have to be vegan to be an atheist, but it makes the most sense to be both.
Expand your perceptions, grow as an individual, and make a meaningful change. Go Vegan.

Name: Phazon
Author: Gravey
Description:
Sir, seems like some new type of material is being produced on this planet. It appears to have a devastating effect should it make contact with our biometal units or buildings. Oddly enough the reaction seems to shave off the scrap it damaged. The North South and Middle pools seem to be quite treacherous to hold, Commander.

8 pools
Medium Size
loose is at pools and center traversals.

Map by Gravey

Name: Rift
Author: Gravey
Description:
I didnt even have more than two empty scouts at a time, and only got to use a pair ONCE. The other time I was just holding them for teammates, who couldnt even be BOTHERED to realize when I passed them, or had COMPLETE LACK OF AWARENESS navigating the space within the base while we were under attack.
My commanding that game was generally speaking quite traditional, and we were only TECH CENTER away from full tech; I shouldnt be faulted when our entire team was in ships and yet repeatedly failed to respond to a base attack.
In fact, I should be credited, as my AI scouts managed to perform more defensive role than most of our team.
The only reason we lost is because Mort is a cunning rat who knows just how to chew at the foundations of an enemy base.


7 pools
5v5 only
No loose

Map by Gravey
